title: How Filters Work

next.title: How Digital Cameras Construct A Color Image

content: Filters allow only certain wavelengths of light to pass through them, while blocking other wavelengths.

question.title: Question #1
question.label:
To better understand how filters work, try out the filter tool.

Select a filter from the dropdown menu and observe the effect that filter has on the light coming out of the prism.
